basic_information.scholarship_name: Donna Nigh Scholarship for Special Education Majors
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Donna Nigh Scholarship for Special Educatio

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to Juniors or Seniors within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Special Education. Eligibility Requirements Must be a Special Education major 2.75 GPA or higher Enrolled full-time (12 hours or more) Must be a junior or senior for the academic year in which the scholarship is awarded Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee 3 junior students awarded and 3 senior students awarded Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship
